title: nannu brOcuTaku
sahitya:
nannu brOcuTaku inta tAmasamA sannutAnga shrI chandrashEkharA


anupallavi

  anni tappulanu manninchi brOvumani nE vinnapambu jEsina vinarAdA 
nApai dayalEdA kanna taNDri nIvEgAdA
(ciTTasvara sAhitya)
pAvanamaina nI sAnidhyamu jEra valasi kOritirA pAvaka nayana nI 
kaTAkshambulEni nAdiyokka jIvanamA vinumA umA mukha sumakAma 
nIrajavairi dhAri madanAri ninnEkOrina brOvavA karuNatO nanu 
girijAdava parAku sEyarAdikanu


caraNam    jagamulella brOcE nIku nenu bhAramA sadAshivuni brOvumA nApAli daivamA suguNadhAmA 
umA samAgamapriyA maruva samayamA chAla kOpamA karuNajUDumA nAtO palukumA
(madhyamakAla sAhitya)
nI mahimula teliyalEnurA brOvakunTE viDuvalEnurA sOmashekharA jAlamElarA durusuga nannElarA
